Credit Line: The Cesnola Collection, Purchased by subscription, 1874–76
Description: Miniature perfume bottleTranslucent turquoise blue-green.Rim folded out, over, and in, flattened on top; long, slightly funnel-shaped neck, tooled in around base; lentoid body with tooled indents in both sides; round bottom.Intact; pinprick and a few very large bubbles; dulling and patches of iridescent weathering.
